title: OMFG PLEASE FIX THE ASHE BUG!!!
body: i just cant take hearing the sound of her volley every time she uses it when i am NOWHERE near her! it comes on at full volume and its sooooo annoying please please please fix it...

replies.body:
Put this in Help&Support. Riot might listen to you

and if the noise annoys you then turn volume off.

Her volley annoys you ??
And what do you mean by nowhere ? Like you hear it when shes like top and your bot ? Or your just in the fog of war and you randomly hear it.
she will be bot and ill be top or mid, and every time she uses it, it sounds on my speakers at the volume it would be if she was right next to me.

Well I guess it could be annoying. Imagine if it was an evelynn Q lol.
At least you know shes attacking something when you cant see her.
Good luck with the bug !
How about the Corki bug where his gattling gun keeps sounding when he's not using it?
One time i be like facecheck bush and even after that i was paranoid that ashe was close
This happens to me too. If she is visible on the map and she uses her W, you can hear it globally. It is very frustrating
